changelog_entry: Initial release: based on Python 3.9.18, on slim-bookworm system, with pip==23.2.1 and poetry==1.6.1
dockerfile_example:
FROM docker.io/python:3.9.18-slim-bookworm@sha256:44b7f161ed03f85e96d423b9916cdc8cb0509fb970fd643bdbc9896d49e1cad0
RUN ln -snf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Etc/UTC /etc/localtime
RUN pip install --upgrade pip==23.2.1
ENV POETRY_VIRTUALENVS_CREATE=false
ENV POETRY_VIRTUALENVS_IN_PROJECT=false
ENV POETRY_NO_INTERACTION=1
RUN pip install poetry==1.6.1
